div.id: home page-template-default page page-id-78 boxed box-shadow lightbox

div.p: This portal is dedicated to the cause of tracking runaway children in the state of Kansas. The collection of accurate and timely information for any missing child in Kansas is critical to achieve a positive outcome. To this end we ask you to be as thorough and as accurate as possible with filling the runaway child information.

a.class: button success is-shade box-shadow-2 box-shadow-5-hover lowercase
button success is-shade box-shadow-2 box-shadow-5-hover lowercase
button success is-shade box-shadow-2 box-shadow-5-hover lowercase
button secondary is-shade box-shadow-2 box-shadow-5-hover lowercase

li.class: gfield gfield_html gfield_html_formatted gfield_no_follows_desc field_sublabel_above field_description_below gfield_visibility_visible
li.p: Welcome to the DCF Portal for missing children. This portal does not possess any data or information as it relates to the welfare of a child. But, rather it is solely used to collect the information necessary to investigate a runway child from the DCF system of care.

The collection of accurate and timely information for any missing child in Kansas is critical to achieve a positive outcome. To this end, we ask you to be as thorough and as accurate as possible with inputting the runaway child’s information.

li.class: gfield gfield_html gfield_html_formatted gfield_no_follows_desc field_sublabel_above field_description_below gfield_visibility_visible

gfield gsection gv-section gv-section gv-section gv-section gv-section gv-section gv-section gv-section gv-section gv-section gv-section gv-section gv-section gv-section gv-section gv-section gv-section gv-section field_sublabel_above field_description_below gfield_visibility_visible
gfield gfield_html gfield_html_formatted gfield_no_follows_desc field_sublabel_above field_description_below gfield_visibility_visible

gfield gsection gv-section gv-section gv-section gv-section gv-section gv-section gv-section gv-section gv-section gv-section gv-section gv-section gv-section gv-section gv-section gv-section gv-section gv-section field_sublabel_above field_description_below gfield_visibility_visible
li.h2: Now, please be as thorough and accurate with the information you are providing regarding the runaway child.

li.label: What is the full name of the child: *

div.class: ginput_complex ginput_container no_prefix has_first_name no_middle_name has_last_name no_suffix gf_name_has_2 ginput_container_name gfield_trigger_change
ginput_complex ginput_container no_prefix has_first_name no_middle_name has_last_name no_suffix gf_name_has_2 ginput_container_name gfield_trigger_change

span.label: Date of when child ran away from provider: (MM/DD/YYYY)*

li.class: gfield gfield_html gfield_html_formatted gfield_no_follows_desc field_sublabel_above field_description_below gfield_visibility_visible

li.label: Exact last known location of runaway child, please provide the exact address using this field:

div.class: ginput_complex ginput_container has_street has_street2 has_city has_state has_zip ginput_container_address gfield_trigger_change
ginput_complex ginput_container no_prefix has_first_name no_middle_name has_last_name no_suffix gf_name_has_2 ginput_container_name gfield_trigger_change

li.class: gfield gfield_html gfield_html_formatted gfield_no_follows_desc field_sublabel_above field_description_below gfield_visibility_visible

li.label: Complete and thorough description of how the child became missing. Please provide exact details of circumstances (such ran away with a friend, etc.)
Is the child a Runaway child or an Exparte? *
How many times has this child ran away: *

div.div: Please enter a value between 0 and 100.

li.class: gfield gfield_html gfield_html_formatted gfield_no_follows_desc field_sublabel_above field_description_below gfield_visibility_visible

li.label: What is the specific length of stay at prior home in number of weeks Number of weeks: *

div.div: Please enter a value between 1 and 1000.

li.label: Does the child have a Gang Affiliations? *
Do you have any concerns that the child may be in any way involved in human sex trafficking or prostitution? *

li.class: gfield gfield_html gfield_html_formatted gfield_no_follows_desc field_sublabel_above field_description_below gfield_visibility_visible

li.label: Please provide the social media account user name(s) the child for each service:
What is the cell phone number or numbers that the child uses (you can provide more than one)

li.class: gfield gfield_html gfield_html_formatted gfield_no_follows_desc field_sublabel_above field_description_below gfield_visibility_visible
gfield gfield_html gfield_html_formatted gfield_no_follows_desc field_sublabel_above field_description_below gfield_visibility_visible

li.label: What is the specific Police Report Number for the child:
Who is the law enforcement contact and agency:
Does the child have any disabilities?: *

li.class: gfield gfield_html gfield_html_formatted gfield_no_follows_desc field_sublabel_above field_description_below gfield_visibility_visible

li.label: What are the child’s medical issues, if any:
What is the list of the child’s medications, if any:
What are the child’s emotional and mental problems, if any:

li.class: gfield gfield_html gfield_html_formatted gfield_no_follows_desc field_sublabel_above field_description_below gfield_visibility_visible

li.label: Are there any court orders for the child (ie. No run orders/house arrest/probation): *
Please update the most recent photos of the child using the upload button (you can upload more than one photo): *
Please provide DCF any advice, leads, or information on how we might be able to find the runway child?
Has the child been reported to the NCMEC (not the NCIC): *

li.class: gfield gfield_html gfield_html_formatted gfield_no_follows_desc field_sublabel_above field_description_below gfield_visibility_visible

ul.li: (REMINDER: Make sure to make a report to NCMEC to have a missing poster made for him. There is a specialized link for social workers to send information about children in care at cmfc.missingkids.org)

li.class: gfield gfield_html gfield_html_formatted gfield_no_follows_desc field_sublabel_above field_description_below gfield_visibility_visible

ul.li: Thank you, this concludes all of the information we need at this time. An email confirmation of this information will be emailed to you within a few minutes. If you need to change any information that was provided to DCF, please reference the record identifier number in your queries to us.
You can contact DCF at: Kody Johnson, Runaway Youth Investigator, Kansas Department for Children and Families, Office: (785) 368-8119, Cell : (785) 338-6941, email: Kody.Johnson@ks.gov
We will contact you if more information is required.

t.div:
Hello
Your Record has been saved successfully!
Record Identifier of is . The same will be sent to your email.
